Package com.cloudera.oryx.computation.common.records

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FieldSpec
    Stores name, type, and position for a field in a Record.
    Record
    Represents a "flat" (i.e., no nested records or collection types) collection of named and typed fields.
    Spec
    Contains type information about a Record instance or about the specific fields contained in a Record.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicSpec  
    Header  
    Header.Builder  
    Records  
    RecordSpec
    The common implementation of the Spec interface for Record instances.
    RecordSpec.Builder  
    SimpleRecord
    A simple Record implementation that wraps an Object[] and performs minimal type checking.
    Specs
    Utility functions for working with header files and Spec data.
    SummarizedRecords  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DataType
    A list of currently supported types for Record instances.
    Header.Type
